text: Youren dui ta shuo:“Ni jin na zuo gongdian qu ba!” Dang ta kanjian na zuo gongdian shi, ta yiwei na shige shuichi, yushi jiu [juan qi yifu] guangzhe shuang tui [xiang jinqu]. Ta [su lai man] shuo:“Zhe shi yige yong guanghua boli jiancheng de gongdian.” Ta shuo:“Wo de zhu a! Wo que yi shi ziji shou sun, wo [xianzai] tong su lai man yiqi guishun an la ¬——zhong shijie de zhule.”
